tweets.text:
Great article here on the massive importance of floodplain wetlands, featuring some of our work at @wildhaweswater with @unitedutilities @NECumbria @EnvAgencyNW and @AquaUoS  

https://t.co/ZioFhUR7fQ

As Area Duty Manager, the incident duty team are busy monitoring and planning for Storm Alex. We have extra field staff on the ground checking assets and clearing trash screens etc. @EnvAgencySW https://t.co/hKQHEWm5QE

Nice article on the power of wetland creation, restoration and management in tackling flooding. @WWTworldwide is pressing for more natural flood management in the UK and doing it ourselves in collaboration with the @EnvAgency and others https://t.co/MyJfzq8Xwy

Perfect example of just how disjointed our system of regulation has become.

I know you need a fishing licence but old man gets £641 fine while Anglian Water, in 2019, spent 133,045 hours dumping sewage into rivers in their service area and nothing happens. Really? @NorfolkPolice https://t.co/TQD2k4ytg6

@riverlevel_0976 @EnvAgencySE @EnvAgency If you’re struggling to allocate someone’s time to fixing this, just give me the key to the door – I have a Mech Eng degree, so will figure out what needs fixing myself as it matters more to me than it does to you, apparently... 🤦🏼‍♂️ your silence speaks mountains 2/2

An angler has been found guilty of fishing without permission on the Norfolk broads. 

The 69-year-old has been ordered to pay £641.

Read more: https://t.co/cI3Fcj8hpg 

Purchase a fishing licence here: https://t.co/EL8RJbzYS0 @NorfolkPolice @BroadsBeat #Norfolk #Fishing https://t.co/ENKwrmcNbw

@riverlevel_0976 @EnvAgencySE @EnvAgency Well done everyone - we made it over the “1 YEAR since this last worked” milestone 👏🏼 Paula never got back to my previous tweet, I called the EA offices 3 times last week and was told I would be updated in the status of this - no reply 1/2
On 26/11/20 at 06:00 the flow was 0m³/s. https://t.co/s86diE8QGa

I’ve written to DEFRA Minister Rebecca Pow asking for a meeting to discuss using reservoirs to mitigate #flooding. Incredibly disappointing that Government voted against my amendment this week but I won’t give up, we need to get this sorted. https://t.co/TGYloJgXXu

urls.title: Virtual Devon Community Resilience Forum 9th July 2021 | Devon Communities Together
urls.description: Booking for our FREE Devon Community Resilience Forum virtual sessions is now open. All sessions are open to Devon's Town and Parish councils, community emergency planning groups, flood wardens/flood groups, snow wardens, and community representatives interested in resilience and community emergency planning. Sign up for as many sessions you can like - or any you can make. We recommend all session attendees also attend our Keynote address. A session on what you need to do once your community emergency

tweets.text: Have you booked your FREE space on next week's Devon Community Resilience Forum yet? Each session covers an aspect of supporting your #community in an emergency, from #lockdown to #flooding & more. Join speakers frm @DevonCC @envagencySW & @DevComsTogether https://t.co/XlFy6kIAcb https://t.co/P17ZDakJ96

tweets.text: It goes on to say: "It is currently unclear what volume of additional water demand could be supplied before new regional infrastructure is completed" which it concludes unlikely to occur before the mid-2030s. https://t.co/gMDAyj7x0O

@bradfordmdc @EnvAgencyYNE @Bradford_TandA @WYFRS @EnvAgency One of the companies operating at this site ZED Tyre Baling Ltd which shares a registered address with Licensed Tyre Disposals Ltd (https://t.co/HzraVap09r) has an 'Active Proposal to Strike off' marker at Companies House.

@EnvAgency @iemanet @EnvAgencyAnglia @RoyalAgUni @nationaltrust @ForestryComm @FCRMResearchEA @eunomian95 @Eunomia_RandC @3KeelLLP At what point does zero carbon start to have a negative effect on populations. At the moment we are racing to a new world that no one today has ever experienced

@bradfordmdc @EnvAgencyYNE @Bradford_TandA @WYFRS @EnvAgency Thank you, so in summary the tyre storage and disposal at this site (see also https://t.co/lq93tR1ySJ) is being done with an @EnvAgency licence but with no planning permission from @bradfordmdc. @EnvAgencyYNE is this not a breach of the licence/permit issued by you?
@AleanKabut7 @EnvAgencyYNE @Bradford_TandA @WYFRS @EnvAgency 17/00305/MAF - This application was withdrawn - all details can be found on our website.
Latest UK Hydrological Outlook published. Normal to above normal #river flows & #groundwater expected in the weeks ahead. More detail: https://t.co/RjVMqSSNUH https://t.co/m9LKLUWFDi

It's our online Net Zero Conference today!

We're bringing together government, environmental charities and the private sector to help reach our 2030 #NetZero carbon footprint goal.

We aim to restore habitats like the ones pictured here.
Follow #EACarbonConference for updates. https://t.co/MNg7a3rykc

Can we ask @hmtreasury if these funds can be accessed by local flood risk authorities to upgrade local ageing drainage and flood defence infrastructure? 

This type of investment is essential to better protect other public infrastructure, residents and businesses. https://t.co/ts4UvUGumE

urls.title: New pumps keep £35 million flood defence scheme on track
urls.description: Work to overhaul Keadby pumping station near Scunthorpe has taken a significant step forward thanks to the arrival on site of the first 2 of 6 new pumps.

tweets.text:
Our drone photo shows work progressing on £35m project to upgrade Keadby pumping station nr #Scunthorpe.

The first pump is being tested & all six will be fully working next year to help protect some 15,000 homes from #flooding. https://t.co/M7IRngk9EY #flood https://t.co/rBKRhbJTlX

urls.title: Flooding can help resurrect wetlands and slow climate change – here's how
urls.description: Flooding isn't always destructive – it can be part of our toolkit for restoring ecosystems.

tweets.text:
FLOODING CAN HELP FIGHT GLOBAL WARMING

Please read and share the physical evidence and research statistics in this article highlighting how floodplain wetlands sequester CO2, moderate downstream flooding and enhance biodiversity. 

WIN-WIN-WIN!

https://t.co/YPUglAGiby https://t.co/29MUGWU9qp
